translations: 拒绝；拒签；否认（deny 的过去式和过去分词）

phrs.translation: deny someone something 拒绝给予

sentences.translation: 她否认对她的两项指控。

sentences.sentence: He denied all knowledge of the crime.
sentences.translation: 他矢口否认对这桩罪案知情。

sentences.sentence: Their claims will be fervently denied.
sentences.translation: 他们的索赔将被严词拒绝。
